items.title: More elbow room in the sky: How to buy a second seat for yourself on US airlines
items.description: There are a number of reasons why you may want to buy yourself a second seat. Here's how to do just that on a variety of U.S. airlines.

items.title: Trump's DOT cancels compensation for airline delays and cancellations
items.description: The Trump administration withdrew a Biden-era proposal to compensate passengers at least $200 when their flight is delayed or canceled.

items.title: Maximize the Citi Trifecta: Earn and redeem Citi ThankYou Rewards points with 3 cards
items.description: Learn more about the high value of adding the Citi Trifecta, combining the earning power of the Double Cash, the Custom Cash and a Strata card.

items.title: Best credit cards of September 2025: 4 top picks based on firsthand experience
items.description: Build up your credit card rewards with these top picks, recommended by TPG's director of points, miles and credit card content

items.title: Deal alert: Points and miles travel deals for September 2025
items.description: Save, maximize and earn points and miles on various travel purchases this September.
